sub_title: Project Manager || Event Manager || Leadership ||Stakeholders management ||  Budgeting|| Fundraising || Event management || Communication || I help companies and associations to succeed.
summary:
An accomplished, solutions-oriented and experienced event and project manager that leads and manages events and projects. Passionate about helping organizations and companies exceed expectations. I have helped companies and organizations with successful and memorable events and projects, landing deals with some of our top clients and partners while operating under budget and deadline which contributed to a 45% increase in revenue.

l love being resourceful to produce positive results, clients satisfactions, and productivity to attain key company'goals.

l, look forward to discussing what I can do for your company, organisation, team, and its growth. 

I'M WILLING TO RELOCATE AND AVAILABLE FOR A REMOTE JOB.

On 11th December 2022, A COMMENDATION AWARD was given to me by Ndichimereze Women's initiative to recognize my services and contributions to the reputable social club 
Am feels loved and honored.l appreciated this AWARD.!!!

treasury_media.title: Nora Obikwelu Foundation(NOF)Hospital visitation.
treasury_media.description:
One of the humanitarian works of my foundation 2022.
Nora Obikwelu Foundation(NOF) visited the woman whose son was admitted to the hospital due to lack of blood and other illness and paid for the hospital bills and empowered her with capital to start petty trade.
Meanwhile, two days before her son got sick, her daughter died due to there was no money to buy medicine to treat her illness and also malnutrition.
Now, her son has been discharged from the hospital alive and cured, all her children are back to school and she is self-employed.

treasury_media.title: fundraiser 2021
treasury_media.description:
KWF is non government organisation that focuses on  one of most dangerous and world known diseases called CANCER.
Yearly fundraising is meant for cancer research so to find improve or advance method of treatment and also to  support cancer patients.

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES: 

*    Independently and actively Organize events,workshops and webinars to empower for people who 
     are  in-between jobs.
*    Listen to  the  job seekers to enable to undertand their needs and coach them different 
     ways to get jobs. (Open-minded and flexible),
*    Initiate new ways, especially for non-dutch Speaking job seekers how to get the right career paths.
*    Influence job seekers on how to navigate in the dutch systems of the labour market.
*    Lead workshops and webinars on personal branding, personal development and entrepreneurship 
     for job seekers to establish and meet their goals.
*   Research for guestspeakers/coaches for learning and practical workshops/webinars.
*   Create interactive workshops and webinars  that lead interaction while connecting and networking 
     within the  group towards finding job in a support environment.
profile_positions.title: Event Manager( Freelancer)

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

 • Plan, manage, direct, and control activities and the needs of the children. 
 • Evaluation of sessions for future better performance.
 • Mobilisation of children for sessions.
 • Guide recreational activities for refugee children in the refugee camp ages 6 to 10 and each activity has a specific theme and purpose such as dealing with anger, stress, friendship, respect, etc.
 •Enhanced knowledge on identification and response to signals of abuse and maltreatment by children and refer the children to a specialist for care and support services.
 • Done intensive and comprehensive training and follow-up-trainings on how to make sessions successful and on child safeguarding responsibilities.
 increased awareness about the challenging situations that can occur during the TeamUp sessions and the ability to come up with a potential solution.

ACHIEVEMENTS // IMPACTS:

 • Initiated games, greeting signs, and other signs that helped reduced the language barrier.
 • Led new games and signs that contributed to an increase in the number of children to 50% each session.
 • Motivated children that helped with reduced emotional problems and bad behaviors to 30%. 
 • Established, games and influenced children that helped with understanding and accepting cultural differences resulting in a 40% increase in respect and friendship.
 • Successfully passed facilitator training/ criteria to obtain facilitator position.
profile_positions.title: Project Facilitator ( TeamUp)

profile_positions.description:
Nora Obikwelu Foundation is a non-governmental and non-profit global organization that is committed to enhancing gender equality, human rights advocacy, empowering disabled less privileged people, and the welfare of human beings in general. 

Am essentially want to groom less privileged handicaps, a voice of the voiceless the deprived people, advocates for prisoners who are injustice in the prisons, and with the necessary skills as the founder of the foundation,l built successful career paths for them.

Through our poverty alleviation, we attempt through workshops, intensive training, vocational training skills programs, protests, providing legal aid, scholarships, mentoring, and coaching. 

RESPONSIBILITIES: 

    • Women empowerment
    • Perfecting the nature of mankind.
    • Aiding those less fortunate.
    • Eliminating the suffering and pain of others 
    • Advocate for human rights in any form.

AACHIEVEMENTS // IMPACTS

    • Created Poverty Alleviation, Poverty Eradication Programmes (PEP) for the less privileged by 
       empowerment through workshops, skills (vocational training) more than 100 people empowered.
    • Mentored, coached, and given seminars that contributed to 50%  of mentees being self-employed.
    * Led workshops which strengthen the Organisation'brand and visibility to 48%

 AWARD:

Awarded best Humanitarian of the year 2022.

volunteer_experiences.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

I enjoy volunteering for this cause because it is very close to my heart and it aligned with what I stand for and care about.

    * Promoted from fundraiser to the District leader.
    * My fundraising takes shape in form of online campaigns and house-to-house collections once a year.
    • Financial Support
    • Urgent Action such as writing campaigning and sending e-mails.
    • Organise demonstrations, actions, debates and social activities.
    • Urgent Action Online such as signing petitions and sending letters.
    • Send greeting cards to people that are unlawfully in prison.
    • Raise awareness for human rights issues on social media.
    • Take action for human rights together with other human rights defenders.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

I enjoy volunteering for this cause because it is also very close to my heart and it aligned with what I care about. Research proved that cancer is top three diseases that kill people all over the world. Research is still going on to find more causes, prevention and cure(treatment) for this deadly disease. That is why this fundraising is very important to researchers and as well as cancer patients.

   • Raise funds for the annual in form of online and house-to-house.
    • Conducted a research project on cancer and which enable us to find solutions for cancer patients.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Manage limited scope of financial and the Founder'tasks.
   Take notes, and prepare meeting minutes and agenda.
*  Prepare and maintain administration end-to-end processes and procedures, update each year with timelines to action tasks each quarter.
*   Prepare meeting materials[PowerPoint, agendas] and ensure distribution to attendees beforehand.
*    Handle correspondence directed to the executive management.
*    Sort for patrons and matrons as well as host them.
*     Maintain professional secrecy in confidence and discretion within every executed task and sensitive information.
*     Arrange work trips abroad for the Founder and the executives.
*     Handle administrative tasks such as travel plans, coordinating meetings, billing and mail management.

ACHIEVEMENTS // IMPACTS:

 *    Reduce the cost of work trips abroad by 75%.
*     Increase of patrons and matrons to 45% in one year which contributes to an increase in profit to  60% in one year.
*     Reduce the cost of running the association to 72%  yearly.
*     Initiate better maintenance and coordinate meetings by considering multiple time zones which contribute to avoiding conflicts to 92 % at each meeting.
* Association documents and information are treated 100%, with discretion and confidentiality.

AWARD:

I received a commendation award as the most dedicated and committed member in the year 2022.
